ColourWords.Instruction: There are incorrect words in eight sentences. Click on the incorrect words.

Content.Sentence:
1 Elizabeth's sister is working in a United Arab Emirates.
2 Who do you think is an oldest student in our class?
3 I studied the philosophy at university.
4 The telephone was invented by Alexander Graham Bell.
5 She's just moved to a house in the North Street.
6 What did you think of a film you saw last night?
7 Would you like fruit or ice cream? An ice cream is home made.
8 Remember to lock a back door before you go to bed.
9 My little brother wants to be the astronaut when he grows up.
10 Hawaii is in the middle of the Pacific Ocean.
